description: Try our easy to follow Nectarine Pancakes With Nectarine Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free,Stone fruit
name: Nectarine Pancakes With Nectarine Syrup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp vanilla extract (save 1 tsp vanilla extract foir nectarine syrup)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 150oC. Place the nectarines and milk in a blender and blend until smooth. Add the flour, baking powder, vanilla, sugar, egg, butter and 1 tsp salt and blend until well combined.

For the nectarine syrup, place nectarine, vanilla and sugar in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until reduced to a jam-like consistency. Remove from the heat and stir in the golden syrup. Set aside.

Heat a medium non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat and use paper towel to grease with a little butter. Add 1/3 cup pancake batter to the pan and cook for 2 minutes or until bubbles appear on the surface of the pancake. Flip over and cook for a further 1 minute or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate, cover with foil and place in the oven to keep warm. Repeat with the remaining pancake batter to make 10 pancakes.
Serve pancakes stacked together, drizzled with nectarine syrup.
